### Ingest

```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, class.source='fold-hide'}

df <- read.csv("archetypes/big-mac-index-foreign-exchange/big-mac-full-index.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE, encoding = "UTF-8")
df

```


### Wrangle
#### Filter rows, select columns, calculate values...

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source ='fold-hide', fig.width=1920/72, fig.height=1080/72, out.width="100%"}

df_wrangle <- df %>% filter(date=='2021-07-01') %>% select(3,4,15)%>%mutate(index=USD_adjusted*100)%>% unite('country_currency',name, currency_code, sep = "_", remove = TRUE, na.rm = FALSE)%>%mutate(color=ifelse(index>0,'1','2'))
df_wrangle

```


### View / Chart
#### Vertical Lollipop

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source ='fold-hide', fig.width=1920/72, fig.height=1280/72, out.width="100%"}

theme_opts <- theme(
    text = element_text(family = "inconsolata"), 
    plot.title = element_text(color = "black", size = 12, face = "bold"),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(color = "black", size = 10),
    plot.caption = element_text(color = "#555555", size = 9),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = '#F5F5F5', color = NA),
    panel.border = element_blank(),
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = '#F5F5F5', color = NA),
    plot.margin = unit(c(0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 0.25), "in"),
    #panel.grid.major.x = element_line(color = "#999999", size = 1.0, linetype = "dotted"),
    panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.major.y = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.minor.y = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks.y = element_blank(),
    axis.text.x = element_blank(),
    legend.position = 'none'
)

```

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source ='fold-hide', fig.width=1920/72, fig.height=1280/72, out.width="100%"}

v1 <- df_wrangle %>%
  mutate(country_currency = fct_reorder(country_currency, index)) %>%
ggplot( aes(x=country_currency,y=index,color=color)) +
  geom_point_interactive(aes(tooltip = paste0(country_currency,': ',index), data_id = country_currency),size=3)+
  geom_hline(yintercept=0)+
  geom_segment(aes(xend=country_currency,yend=0),color=gray(.50))+
  labs(title = "The Big Mac index",
       subtitle = "Local currency under-/over-valuation against the $, % July 2021",
       x = NULL,
       y = 'Index value',
       fill = "Interval") +
   annotate("text", x = 45, y = 25, label = "Overvalued",size=5)+
  annotate("text", x = 10, y = -35, label = "Undervalued",size=5)+
  theme_minimal() +
  theme_opts

girafe(ggobj = v1, width_svg = 1080/72, height_svg = 720/72,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 0.9))
)

```
